Nature of Consciousness.quote: "Consciousness is the foundation of all existence." (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 3.8.11)

Levels of Consciousness.quote: "From matter to mind to supermind, consciousness evolves." (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Pure Consciousness.quote: "That which is the witness of all states is pure consciousness." (Yoga Vasistha 5.76)

Divine Awareness.quote: "I know what is past, and what is yet to come." (Bhagavad Gita 7:26)

Cosmic Mind.quote: "The universe exists as idea in the cosmic mind." (Yoga Sutras 4.24)

Supreme Knowledge.quote: "In that supreme knowledge is contained all knowledge." (Mundaka Upanishad 1.1.3)

Transcendental Consciousness.quote: "Beyond thought, beyond form, beyond all qualities." (Mandukya Upanishad)

Divine Intelligence.quote: "The divine intelligence permeates all existence." (Plotinus, Enneads V.1)

Omniscience.quote: "Nothing in all creation is hidden from God's sight." (Hebrews 4:13)

Eternal Witness.quote: "The Self is the eternal witness." (Katha Upanishad 2.2.12)

Divine Light.quote: "God is light, and in him is no darkness at all." (1 John 1:5)

Divine Recognition.quote: "To know thyself is to know God." (Clement of Alexandria)

Conscious Force.quote: "Consciousness-Force is the creator of the worlds." (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Divine Perception.quote: "With divine eyes, I see all." (Bhagavad Gita 11:8)

Supreme Understanding.quote: "Understanding of the supreme is supreme understanding." (Kena Upanishad)

Absolute Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge of the Absolute is absolute knowledge." (Hegel, Phenomenology of Spirit)

Unity Consciousness.quote: "All is one in divine consciousness." (Plotinus, Enneads VI.9)

Divine Mind.quote: "The divine mind contains all possibilities." (Nicholas of Cusa)

Spiritual Awareness.quote: "The spirit searches all things, even the deep things of God." (1 Corinthians 2:10)

Cosmic Consciousness.quote: "The universe is conscious through and through." (Alfred North Whitehead)

Divine Reflection.quote: "As above, so below." (Hermes Trismegistus, Emerald Tablet)

Supreme Consciousness.quote: "That supreme consciousness which is one without a second." (Chandogya Upanishad)

Divine Knowing.quote: "In knowing the Self, all is known." (Upanishads)

Divine Understanding.quote: "Understanding dwells in the divine mind." (Thomas Aquinas)

Consciousness Force.quote: "Consciousness is force, force is consciousness." (Sri Aurobindo)

Divine Presence.quote: "The divine is present as pure consciousness." (Kashmir Shaivism)
